title: Inside Gemma Collins and James 'Arg' Argent's fractured romance as she dumps him again
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Gemma Collins and James 'Arg' Argent 's romance has been packed with explosive break ups and over the top make-ups.

Yet now it appears their love story could have come to the final chapter in recent days after eight years on and off together.

The GC has called things off with Arg following an incident where paramedics were rushed to his £1.4million mansion where he lives with his parents.

They have been on and off for eight years, yet it could be over for good this time round.

The exes were already on rocky ground; Arg was pictured moving back into his parents' £1.3million mansion earlier in October after their relationship had another hiccup.

(Image: Instagram)

Their romance blossomed in the early days of TOWIE when they first crossed paths in 2011.

They even planned to go down the aisle when the pair got engaged in 2013; however, the couple called off the wedding and haven't put a ring on it in the time that has passed since.

The lovebirds were back together officially in 2018, much to the delight of original TOWIE fans.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

(Image: Getty)

But the duo got into an explosive row after James posted a video of Gemma snoring on Instagram in February.

It was claimed the argument escalated when James fat-shamed Gemma by saying she had "more rolls than Greggs" in a slew of abusive messages.

The couple did get back together for a few months.

The latest break up comes after Gemma alerted 999 to her on/off beau's home amid growing concerns for his welfare on Thursday.

James, who was kicked off the ITVBe show this year after failing a drug test for cocaine, was checked over by paramedics after worried pals raised the alarm fearing he had overdosed or collapsed inside his new £1.3million mansion.

A friend told The Sun : "Gemma told him she will not be with him until he sorts himself out."

The Mirror have approached Gemma Collin's representatives for further comment.
description: Yet now it appears their love story could have come to the final chapter in recent days after eight years on and off together
